section.p: Record of the product information of an issued item.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] description with data type String
A textual representation of the nature and characteristics of a product

Contains exactly one [1..1] lotId with data type String
The "Lot Number Text" provides the facility to communicate the lot number or batch number information, as an alphanumeric string, for the specific item being described. [HL7 3.0]

Contains exactly one [1..1] manufacturerModelName with data type Code
An alphanumeric code that is used to identify the model of a product

Contains exactly one [1..1] serialNumber with data type Id
An alphanumaric text that is one of a series and is used for identification of a device

Contains exactly one [1..1] description with data type String
A textual representation of the nature and characteristics of a product

Contains exactly one [1..1] lotId with data type String
The "Lot Number Text" provides the facility to communicate the lot number or batch number information, as an alphanumeric string, for the specific item being described. [HL7 3.0]

Contains exactly one [1..1] manufacturerModelName with data type Code
An alphanumeric code that is used to identify the model of a product

Contains exactly one [1..1] serialNumber with data type Id
An alphanumaric text that is one of a series and is used for identification of a device
